page.title: 05Transport_M6 Motorway
page.content: The motorway,grey,boring,dull. The noisy cars rushing past Leaving a gush of black smoke behind. The exciting noise of horns ringing in the air. Black, yellow, orange, blue_cars of all colours Vroom vroom_ a motorbikes engine roaring past. Flashing lights dazzling bright and shiny. But the motorway is an eyesore and is boring and dull. By Linsey Ruddell. The M6 passes through our area. There are two carriageways, north and south. In a ten minute period on Thursday morning there were 731 vehicles. In a ten minute period on Friday evening there were 944 vehicles. On Friday evening there is usually a 'rush hour'.
